decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The development to which this permission relates shall be carried out in accordance with the materials specified on the approved plans and on the submitted application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Prior to beneficial occupation of the development to which this permission relates, any windows inserted at first floor level and above in the northern and southern elevation shall be constructed so that no part of the framework less than 1.7m above finished floor level shall be openable. Any part below that level shall be fitted with and permanently retained in obscure glazing to a minimum of level 3 on the standard scale. Any film used to achieve the requisite obscurity level shall be non-perishable, tamper-proof, and shall be replaced immediately in the event that it ceases to result in obscurity to level 3.Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The development must be carried out in accordance with the provisions of the Arboricultural Statement prepared by Crown Tree Consultancy dated 2 October 2024 unless otherwise approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.Reason: To ensure that trees that are important to the character of the area or covered by TPOs are not adversely affected in accordance with Policy G7 of the London Plan 2021 and Policy DM10 of the Council's Core Strategy 2012.

The development must be carried out in accordance with the provisions of the Fire Safety Statement submitted on 23 August 2024 unless otherwise approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. Reason: To ensure that the development incorporates the necessary fire safety measures in accordance with the Mayor's London Plan Policy D12.
description: Demolition of an existing front/side part, erection of two storey rear, single storey side and front porch extension. Roof extension with 2nos front and 2nos rear dormers and installation of 4nos side rooflights. Fenestration alteration
